entry.title: $1750 // a GORGEOUS_1BR_NEW BUILDING_with LAUNDRY_BROADWAY-38ST_ N-W--R-M
entry.content:
IN THE CENTER OF ALL AT BROADWAY


CORNER BEDROOM

LIVING ROOM

KITCHEN WITH STAINLESS STEEL APPLIANCES

TALL WOOD CABINETS

** WASHERS AND ** DRYERS
*** FOLDING TABLE**
*** SURVEILLANCE CAMERAS**
** BICYCLE STORAGE AREA**
***ONSITE TENANT'S ASSISTANT**

** VERY NEAR THE BROADWAY TRAINS .............. ..... N\ W
*** ALSO NEAT THE STEINWAY STREET TRAINS .. R \ M
*** SURROUDED BY MANY STORES, AND RESTAURANTS, OUTDOOR CAFES, BANKS, CLEANERS, SUPERMARKETS, HAIR SALONS, NAIL SALONS, AND CLOTHING BOUTIQUES.....
COME TO VIEW
